ingredients.ingredient: ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 (12 fluid ounce) can lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Brown steaks in a hot skillet to develop a flavorful crust before braising
Use the lemon-lime soda to tenderize and add subtle sweetness to the gravy
Cover and braise in the oven for even cooking and tender meat
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you use an unconventional ingredient like lemon-lime soda to create a tender, flavorful sauce?
